alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Nez Perce; Shoshone (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued June 09 at 3:31PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...PERIODS OF RAIN FOR THE IDAHO PANHANDLE AND BLUE MOUNTAINS OF SOUTHEAST WASHINGTON TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY... Several rounds of rain will cause rises on creeks and streams across the Cascade Crest, Idaho Panhandle, and the Blue Mountains. Increasing flow on the Okanogan River will occur over the weekend into early next week due to spring snow melt and rain runoff. Throughout the Idaho Panhandle and Blue mountains, widespread rain amounts of 1 to 3 inches are possible tonight into next week. Swift currents and cold water will be potential hazards for recreation along rivers and streams this weekend into next week. Minor rock slides may also be a possibility in steep terrain. Burn scars may be particularly vulnerable to mud and rock slides.
